mutants.original_line: if arr == arr[::-1]:    # If array is already palindrome
mutants.code:
def min_changes(arr, limit):
    if arr != arr[::-1]:
        return 0
    n = len(arr)
    l = 0
    r = n - 1
    counter = 0
    changes = set()
    while l <= r:
        if arr[l] == arr[r]:
            l += 1
            r -= 1
        else:
            counter += 1
            changes.add((min(arr[l], arr[r]), max(arr[l], arr[r])))
            if len(changes) > limit:
                return -1
            arr[l] = arr[r] = min(arr[l], arr[r])
            l += 1
            r -= 1
    return counter
